faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without requiring a visa specifically for property investment. You will need an NIE (Spanish tax identification number) for the purchase process. Our team can guide you through all legal requirements and documentation needed for a smooth transaction.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the property price, expect costs including: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), land registry fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). Financing costs and property inspections may also apply. We recommend consulting with a Spanish lawyer or accountant for precise calculations based on your circumstances.
